thread.title: India's central bank cuts key interest rate to 6.75%
thread.title_full: India's central bank cuts key interest rate to 6.75%

title: India's central bank cuts key interest rate to 6.75%
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Sep 29, 2015, 07:04 BST - UK Markets open in 56 mins. India's central bank cuts key interest rate to 6.75% AFP – 20 minutes ago View Photo 

India's central bank cut interest rates by 50 basis points on Tuesday in a bid to boost stuttering growth, with inflation well below its target level. 
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) lowered the benchmark repo rate -- the level at which it lends to commercial banks -- to 6.75 percent, a larger cut than analysts had expected.
